H-1B Visas and Big Tech

An independent research project looking at how the tech industry has become increasingly dependent on the H-1B visa, and what that means for the future of the program and the workers it brings to the US.

Read more

Scraping the Supreme Court

SCOTUS Scraper is a project to collect US Supreme Court opinions, briefs, and other documents filed with the Court and make them available in machine-readable format.
